feed.title: SolidInvoice Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for SolidInvoice: 2.2.2
entry.content:
Release Notes for 2.2.2

Next minor bugfix release

2.2.2

  • Total issues resolved: 0
  • Total pull requests resolved: 7
  • Total contributors: 1

DataGridBundle,bug

  • 785: Fix BackGrid Object formatter thanks to @pierredup

enhancement

  • 769: Update Docker images thanks to @pierredup
  • 764: Update API docs to provide more information thanks to @pierredup

UserBundle,bug

  • 766: Add event listener to update users last login thanks to @pierredup

bug

  • 765: Fix updating company name doesn't update all references thanks to @pierredup
  • 748: Set default data when creating a new company thanks to @pierredup

refactor

  • 763: Run Rector and clean up code thanks to @pierredup

entry.title: New release for SolidInvoice: 2.2.3
entry.content:
Release Notes for 2.2.3

2.2.3

  • Total issues resolved: 0
  • Total pull requests resolved: 2
  • Total contributors: 1

bug,php

  • 820: Fix setting tax rates on invoices and quotes thanks to @pierredup

bug

  • 819: Fix adding users to quotes and invoices thanks to @pierredup

entry.title: New release for SolidInvoice: 2.2.4
entry.content:
Release Notes for 2.2.4

2.2.4

  • Total issues resolved: 0
  • Total pull requests resolved: 7
  • Total contributors: 1

enhancement

  • 911: Add sentry integration thanks to @pierredup

bug

  • 853: Fix auto-incrementing invoice and quote IDs thanks to @pierredup
  • 841: Fix currency handling thanks to @pierredup
  • 837: Fix actions dropdown on the datagrid thanks to @pierredup
  • 836: Fix repository methods to delete entities thanks to @pierredup
  • 835: Filter out PDO drivers not supported by Doctrine during installation thanks to @pierredup
  • 834: Fix migrations when using MariaDB 10.5 thanks to @pierredup

entry.title: New release for SolidInvoice: 2.2.5

Release Notes for 2.2.5

2.2.5

  • Total issues resolved: 0

bug

  • 932: Add option to set a global default mailer instead of using null thanks to @pierredup

entry.title: New release for SolidInvoice: 2.2.6
entry.content:
Release Notes for 2.2.6

2.2.x bugfix release (patch)

2.2.6

  • Total issues resolved: 4
  • Total pull requests resolved: 7
  • Total contributors: 4

bug

  • 982: Fix incorrect option when adding TaxType to item thanks to @pierredup and @sentry-io[bot]
  • 980: Fix Money DataTransformer discarding cent values thanks to @pierredup and @pkoniecz
  • 968: Fix error when saving contact details with an empty type thanks to @pierredup and @sentry-io[bot]
  • 937: Add env config to a new separate path thanks to @pierredup
  • 934: Add email subject to password reset request email thanks to @pierredup

InvoiceBundle,bug

  • 967: Reset entity manager when it is closed thanks to @pierredup

enhancement

  • 938: Add additional configuration for Sentry thanks to @pierredup
